summary: The document is a declassified communication pertaining to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details a request for guidance on the sharing of files related to Lee Harvey Oswald with the US government, highlighting the uncooperative stance of a party, possibly a foreign entity, in this matter. Notably, it mentions that some files were selectively shared with Norman Mailer for his book, raising questions about the transparency and willingness to cooperate fully.
key_findings: The document is part of the 2025 release under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It discusses the reluctance of a party to share files related to Lee Harvey Oswald with the US government.
Mentions that some files were shared with Norman Mailer for his book, suggesting selective sharing.
The communication is a request for guidance on whether to continue pursuing the sharing of these files.
